commands.command: SELECT f_source_code , f_source_name , f_source_text , f_status_code , f_invoke_time , f_finish_time , f_result_text , f_insert_name , f_insert_time , f_update_name , f_update_time FROM t_report_source ORDER BY f_source_code

INSERT INTO t_report_source (f_source_name, f_source_text, f_status_code, f_invoke_time, f_finish_time, f_result_text, f_insert_name, f_insert_time, f_update_name, f_update_time) VALUES(@SourceName, @SourceText, @StatusCode, DATETIME('now', 'localtime'), @FinishTime, @ResultText, @InsertName, DATETIME('now', 'localtime'), @InsertName, DATETIME('now', 'localtime')) RETURNING f_source_code, f_invoke_time, f_insert_time, f_update_time

UPDATE t_report_source SET f_status_code = @StatusCode , f_finish_time = DATETIME('now', 'localtime') , f_result_text = @ResultText , f_update_name = @UpdateName , f_update_time = DATETIME('now', 'localtime') WHERE f_source_code = @SourceCode RETURNING f_finish_time, f_update_time

SELECT f_source_code , f_invoke_code , f_invoke_name , f_invoke_text , f_status_code , f_invoke_size , f_finish_size , f_invoke_time , f_finish_time , f_result_flag , f_result_text , f_insert_name , f_insert_time , f_update_name , f_update_time FROM t_report_invoke WHERE f_source_code = @SourceCode AND f_invoke_code = @InvokeCode

INSERT INTO t_report_invoke (f_source_code, f_invoke_code, f_invoke_name, f_invoke_text, f_status_code, f_invoke_size, f_finish_size, f_invoke_time, f_finish_time, f_result_flag, f_result_text, f_insert_name, f_insert_time, f_update_name, f_update_time) VALUES(@SourceCode, @InvokeCode, @InvokeName, @InvokeText, @StatusCode, @InvokeSize, @FinishSize, @InvokeTime, @FinishTime, @ResultFlag, @ResultText, @InsertName, DATETIME('now', 'localtime'), @InsertName, DATETIME('now', 'localtime')) RETURNING f_insert_time, f_update_time

UPDATE t_report_invoke SET f_status_code = @StatusCode , f_invoke_time = DATETIME('now', 'localtime') , f_update_name = @UpdateName , f_update_time = DATETIME('now', 'localtime') WHERE f_source_code = @SourceCode AND f_invoke_code = @InvokeCode RETURNING f_invoke_time, f_update_time

UPDATE t_report_invoke SET f_invoke_size = @InvokeSize , f_finish_size = @FinishSize , f_update_name = @UpdateName , f_update_time = DATETIME('now', 'localtime') WHERE f_source_code = @SourceCode AND f_invoke_code = @InvokeCode RETURNING f_update_time

UPDATE t_report_invoke SET f_status_code = @StatusCode , f_finish_time = DATETIME('now', 'localtime') , f_result_flag = @ResultFlag , f_result_text = @ResultText , f_update_name = @UpdateName , f_update_time = DATETIME('now', 'localtime') WHERE f_source_code = @SourceCode AND f_invoke_code = @InvokeCode RETURNING f_finish_time, f_update_time
